front.title: Network Management Intent -One of IBN Use Cases

abstract.t: Full life cycle network management will be a key feature of the future communication networks. Meanwhile, the complexity of the network management should be reduced and the network expects to be managed in a fully automated manner with humans out of the loop. In this document, we propose an use case of intent based network management to achieve more flexible, convenient, and efficient network management. In this use case, we propose an architecture and attempt to illustrate the five levels of achieving full autonomous network management.
